abilities.name: Verdant Growth
abilities.details: Every several seconds, Velerias's next basic attack with her scepter deals bonus [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]) and creates a small circle of Verdant Soil at her location for a short duration.[n]Allies standing on this soil are [bf]healed[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]) for a small amount every second.

abilities.name: Root Bind
abilities.details: Velerias thrusts her scepter forward, sending a line of sharp wooden briars through the earth, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]) to the first enemy hit and [db]root[/] the target for a short duration.[n]If Velerias is standong on a Verdant Soil, the root duration is [db]increased[/].[n]In Wood Dragon form, the briars spread out in a wider area, dealing increased [ap]magical damage[/] and [db]rooting[/] all enemies hit instead.

abilities.name: Living Bark
abilities.details: Velerias wraps herself and her lowest-health nearby ally hero in enchanted bark, granting both a [sh]shield[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]) for a few seconds.[n]In Wood Dragon form, the [bf]shield strength[/] is increased and all nearby allies are also [sh]shielded[/] over the duration of the shield.

abilities.name: Thorn Embrace
abilities.details: Velerias targets an enemy hero, tethering them to her scepter with a spectral vine for a few seconds.[n]While tethered, the enemy deals [bf]reduced damage[/] to Velerias while she continuously drains the target's [hp]health[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]).[n]At the end of the duration, the thorns grows out from the vine, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]) and [db]rooting[/] the target for a short duration.[n]In Wood Dragon form, if the tether ends or the target dies, the vine bursts into life, [bf]healing[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]) the nearest allied hero.

abilities.name: Forest Breaker
abilities.details: Velerias transforms into an elder Wood Dragon form, gaining increased [bf]size[/], [bf]attack range[/] and [hp]maximum health[/].[n]In Wood Dragon form, her Verdant Soil [bf]radius[/] is larger and the [bf]healing[/] is increased.[n]All of Velerias's abilities are enhanced while in Wood Dragon form.
